## SmartArtNode.Position property

Returns or sets zero-based position of node among sibling nodes. Read/write Int32.

```csharp
public int Position { get; set; }
```

### Exceptions

| exception | condition |
| --- | --- |
| ArgumentOutOfRangeException | value is less than 0. -or- value is equal to or greater than siblings count |
